Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: SockMonkey
Reviews.Content: Bought this 2 weeks ago, the iPhone 4s 16 GB in black for Virgin Mobile, and I absolutely love it! First, let me say a big thank you to Virgin Mobile for offering this phone! It's a life-saving convenience especially with how low Virgin's plans are for the iPhone compared to other carriers.I can easily see why people just can't seem to take their hands off their iPhones and why it's been so popular in the market. Before this, I had a Samsung Intercept running Android 2.2 bought around 3 years ago also for Virgin Mobile. Having had experiencing with an Android phone, I would say that I would only go back to it once they stabilize the Android operating system a bit more. My android tended to be fast for the first 2 months and then was reduced to a crawl, and then had to be hard-resetted and that made it work again (maybe a little faster, but not anything as fast as the iPhone). It would be comparing apples to oranges (pun intended) comparing my old phone with this iPhone, but it is very easy to get comfortable with the iPhone.The front and back panels are made of glass so be very careful where you put your iPhone. It will slide off couch arm-rests so it's best to put it on solid surface. I would als orecommend buying insurance (since you cannot buy any through Virgin Mobile), or get a phone case. The display is lovely, very vibrant, and Retina Display makes everything so crystal clear. The camera is probably the best I have seen. There's also a plethora of apps. Siri works great and so does FaceTime--and this has worked without any lag even when I did video chats with my parents halfway across the world! Call clarity and reception bars tend to be better on this phone than it used to be on my old Android. I would say maybe the speaker is a bit weak making sound quality not clear (using headphones it is), but it's good enough for a phone. I don't think I will feel the need to upgrade any time soon, no matter how many new iPhones or Androids are released. This phone does it all!

Reviews.Title: Just Like Everyone Else Now
Reviews.Author: Mystery Lover
Reviews.Content: Finally Got The Nerve To Buy This Phone....An Iphone like everyone Else i Know.....And I Gotta say i love The Crap outta It. it was easy....bought it activated it...and boom i was in iphone heaven. it works great, the service seems better i dont know why. the apps and games and the great camera. the price...well its an iphone. it dosent have a virgin mobile logo on it like other phones so i can be like everyone else. great monthly plan. i cant get over how nice it is. i suggest this sleek little phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!
Reviews.Author: Casey Zupan
Reviews.Content: I know everyone says that if they have an iphone but it's true. It's a great phone. I have my music, texting, and apps all in one place and i love it. the only problem is it dies too much

Reviews.Title: She's in love!
Reviews.Author: Ms. C
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this phone for her birthday and she was  very stoked(her words) so I guess that's good. Great phone!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4s
Reviews.Author: Cassidee Heppner
Reviews.Content: Left speaker was blown out, phone doesn't stay off, and volume goes in and out. Not a "very good" product to me.

Reviews.Title: 4s
Reviews.Author: Raza Baig
Reviews.Content: The processing speed is not far from the processing speed of the iPhone 5, one of the only complaints i have would be the battery life

Reviews.Title: my first iPhone
Reviews.Author: In My Old Age "Jean"
Reviews.Content: My first iPhone, always had androids before. Was easy to figure out. Has been some bugs but so far an update comes right away to fix it. They must be right on top of things with developers. Wish I had gotten something with bigger screen but still I do love it as it is. I recommend getting at least this 16GB , friends with only 8gb are telling me it's not enough.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Paige
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I bought this phone. I love it so much. I've had no problems with it so far. It came in great packaging and I would definitely recommend this!

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: Mindi Glass
Reviews.Content: This product was exactly what I expected. I would recommend this product to others. Very satisfied with the product. Really pleased.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: I returned mine because I could not get used to this kind of operating system. I like android much better. The only flaw I found is that the screen is rather small and it was kind of heavy, Siri does not work all the time but overall it is a good phone if your into Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Isidro Flores
Reviews.Content: The iPhone 4S is great phone, dispite beign almost 2 years old at the time of this review. The phone has decent battery life, with some text messages, web browsing and an ocassional picture I get 8-10 hours on a single charge. The camera can still hold its own with some of the newer phones, photos taken in bright environments look excellent, in darker settings they still look decent, I took some photos in complete darkness, with the object about 2-3 feet away, using flash. The photo had enough detail, that if you ever have to make take a picture in complete darkness it won't disappoint. Calls sounds clear, and data speeds are fast enough to watch videos, most times without lots buffering on the Virgin Mobile network.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Marilu
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone!  it is all that its hyped up to be... do recommend it.  you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: The Best Phone I've ever had!
Reviews.Author: Mistee c.
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! It is easy to use and does so many things. I love siri, she saves me tons of time text messaging. I would definitely buy it again and probably could have paid for it with the money I spent on cheap phones in the past year, 5 of them. Just be sure you get a good case because the phone is made of glass.

Reviews.Title: What is there to say
Reviews.Author: Jimb0
Reviews.Content: Its an iphone the greatest piece of technology ever invented.on the cheapest network you will find ,which has above average 3g speed and all the talk time you need for fitty bucks . Get yours

Reviews.Title: Horrible service
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Horrible Service, does not deserve even one star. shipment was slow, just had the ad up, I had to wait three months to hear back from seller. Don't buy anything, or they will take twice the amount for the item. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Perfect!
Reviews.Author: TyShima
Reviews.Content: Though I had to pay A LOT for this phone to get it in the no-contract version, I couldn't be happier with the product! This is hands down the best phone I ever had and the name I-Phone speaks for itself.

Dual-Core A5 Chip
iOS 6
Retina display, 960-by-640-pixel resolution at 326 ppi
8-megapixel iSight camera, 1080p HD video recording
1 Year Limited Manufacturer's Warranty
